protein.specific_function: Iron-sulfur protein (IP) subunit of succinate dehydrogenase (SDH) that is involved in complex II of the mitochondrial electron transport chain and is responsible for transferring electrons from succinate to ubiquinone (coenzyme Q).

reference.reference_text: Au HC, Ream-Robinson D, Bellew LA, Broomfield PL, Saghbini M, Scheffler IE: Structural organization of the gene encoding the human iron-sulfur subunit of succinate dehydrogenase. Gene. 1995 Jul 4;159(2):249-53.
